title: Replace PGLite with libSQL for vector storage
description:
Migrate from PGLite to libSQL for semantic memory and swarm-mail storage. libSQL has native vector support, no extension loading, no WAL issues, and works portably across all platforms.

**Why:**
- PGLite WAL accumulation causing 2.7GB+ cruft in /tmp
- NOTICE spam polluting logs
- Daemon/socket complexity for multi-process access
- Extension loading requires OS-level deps (Homebrew SQLite)

**libSQL advantages:**
- Native F32_BLOB vector columns
- vector_distance_cos() for similarity search
- No extensions, no WASM complexity
- Battle-tested SQLite WAL mode
- Optional Turso cloud sync
- ~200KB vs ~15MB bundle

**Spike validated:** packages/swarm-mail/scripts/sqlite-vec-spike.ts

**Success criteria:**
- All existing memory tests pass with LibSQLAdapter
- No PGLite imports remain in swarm-mail
- WAL/daemon code removed
- Bundle size reduced
